text: Brickellia chenopodina (chenopod brickellbush) is a North American species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to Grant County in New Mexico.Wooton, Elmer Ottis & Standley, Paul Carpenter 1913. Contributions from the United States National Herbarium 16(4): 177 ==References== ==External links== *photo of herbarium specimen at Missouri Botanical Garden, collected in New Mexico, type specimen of Coleosanthus chenopodinus/Brickellia chenopodina chenopodina Category:Flora of New Mexico Category:Plants described in 1913
title: Brickellia chenopodina
